entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump If you see a socialist coronavirus, arm yourself with a sledge hammer, a MAGA hat and a photo of Ivanka. Show the photo to the virus to numb it and then beat the virus repeatedly with the hammer while screaming "MAGA DEFEATS YOU, SOCIALIST MONSTER!" repeatedly. Stfu 🤣
